review: This device is so handy.  Instantly stream almost anything to your TV wirelessly.  If that idea doesn't excite you, then maybe this isn't for you.  I've never had any connection issues in my house with three devices trading off streaming to it.  Video quality is superb and the number of compatible apps is constantly growing.  Netflix and HBO Go are some huge wins for this ecosystem.  Just buy it, it rocks.
